level.text: An attorney or other individual designated by a mediation party may accompany the party to and participate in a mediation.
A waiver of participation given before the mediation may be rescinded.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-87
level.text: For Law 16-87, see notes following ยง 16-4201.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 10 of the Uniform Mediation Act.
